text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Age 4: Snarfing windmill cookies. The flu hits me like flicking a switch. Windmill cookie puke everywhere. The thought of windmill cookies still makes me queasy. So the planet is me, COVID19 is the flu & Trump is windmill cookies. The mere mention of him is upchuckable worldwide.
